description: Positions of permutations produced by the transposition sequence A060135 in A055089.
maple: apply_transpositions(A060135); apply_transpositions := proc(a) local k,b,t,p; p := []; k := nops(factorial_base(nops(a)))+1; b := [PermRevLexRank(convert(p,'permlist',k))]; for t in a do p := permul(p,[[t,t+1]]); b := [op(b),PermRevLexRank(convert(p,'permlist',k))]; od; RETURN(b); end;
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 02 2001
